code: @Override public HttpClient configureHttpClient(HttpClient client) {     if (proxy) {         client.getState().setProxyCredentials(AuthScope.ANY, this.credentials).     } else {         client.getState().setCredentials(AuthScope.ANY, this.credentials).     }     return client. }

public static HttpClientConfigurer basicAutenticationConfigurer(boolean proxy, String user, String pwd) {     return new AuthenticationHttpClientConfigurer(proxy, new UsernamePasswordCredentials(user, pwd)). }

public static HttpClientConfigurer ntlmAutenticationConfigurer(boolean proxy, String user, String pwd, String domain, String host) {     return new AuthenticationHttpClientConfigurer(proxy, new NTCredentials(user, pwd, host, domain)). }
